name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 17 (Released) A delivery man fell down and convulsed while riding a bicycle. The mobile phone he carried with him was still prompting: "There is a new takeaway order." February 17 (Released) Guangzhou. A delivery man fell down and convulsed while riding a bicycle. There was a pool of blood on the ground. During this time, other people kept passing by on bicycles. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891517869110038528/pu/img/JU310yHR-joC5OMO.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 17, Laiwu District, Jinan, Shandong. Taishan Steel reportedly broke its funding chain, causing thousands of people who participated in the financing to go to the company to defend their rights. According to workers, the Laiwu District government asked them to relocate two years ago and promised them a lot of benefits, but now they are not delivering. Last year, the government borrowed hundreds of millions of yuan from them to pay wages, causing Taishan Steel to break its funding chain and face bankruptcy. People who participated in the financing could not withdraw their money, and many payments for goods could not be settled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 16, when the staff of DoCar.com live-streamed the test of the intelligent driving function of the BYD Qin L DM 2025 on the highway, two high-risk safety takeovers occurred in the video. At 42 seconds in the video, the vehicle suddenly ran from the second left lane to the first left lane and almost hit the wall; at 3 minutes and 10 seconds in the video, a dragon appeared on the steering wheel. (A dragon means that the vehicle cannot maintain a stable straight line while driving, but shakes left and right or moves in a serpentine manner) https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891521291414577152/pu/img/V2e7-CpQ0tm4wBiZ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 16, Harbin, Heilongjiang. A former medical worker said that in Harbin, you can't become a head nurse without a background and a backer. Now this industry is no longer patient-centered, but everyone is thinking about how to flatter the leaders. "One more bottle of medicine, one less bottle of medicine, or the wrong dosage, in my opinion, is commonplace" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891528172379983872/pu/img/-p8Ey86RZ6WnO-8k.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger said that as of January, Taishan Iron and Steel's commercial bills were overdue by 1.1 billion yuan, and the employees' deposits were expected to be close to 2 billion yuan. The project funds were even more. The employees' wages had not been paid for several months, and the situation was getting more and more difficult. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891534369593987072/pu/img/MDh9NTXic5Du1kXw.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 16, Chenzhou, Hunan. A retired soldier borrowed millions of yuan to buy a house that was left unfinished. However, he said that although the house was unfinished, in the face of major issues, the country is definitely more important, and if there is a call for war, we will definitely go back. "If Taiwan needs us to go home now, we will definitely do our best." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891564257545945091/pu/img/HmDaLeDm4nkcAnUP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 17, a Delta Air Lines flight carrying about 80 passengers appeared to have a hard landing while flying from Minnesota to Toronto Pearson Airport.
No deaths have been reported so far. There are already numerous photos and videos showing that passengers safely evacuated the plane, which flipped over on the ground. According to medical staff, at least 8 people were injured. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891596859191275520/pu/img/13QoBQIPUvFvyMbQ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
February 16, Nantong, Jiangsu. The property contract of Country Garden Jiaqiman Community expired, and the owners spontaneously organized a vote to replace the new property, which was opposed by Country Garden Property.
Country Garden organized hundreds of people in black to form a human wall to prevent the new property from entering the site on February 15, and also organized a human wall to block the major entrances of the community. The police station police arrived at the scene but did not take any action against Country Garden's behavior. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891597269054398464/pu/img/lQTiMVYZ_wxfmPe0.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 16, Chongqing. Netizen "Ming" is a college student. When he was looking for a part-time job on a recruitment software, the HR of a milk tea shop told him that the part-time job was 8 yuan per hour.
He replied "toothbrush, 8 fast" and was retorted by the HR: "Find out your position, scraps"
Afterwards, netizens gave this milk tea shop bad reviews on social media platforms, and the store has now closed. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkC8azbbkAAQvgz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 18, a blogger discovered that the Weibo topic #月赚5000什么水平# was banned by the platform, but #月赚15000你的生命会怎么样# was not banned. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkDrbTeaQAA-5t0.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 17, Baidu founder Robin Li was reportedly absent from a symposium held by Xi Jinping and private enterprise leaders. As soon as the news came out, Baidu's Hong Kong stock price plummeted (February 17), and its market value evaporated by US$2.4 billion.
A sales director of a regional securities company who did not want to be named said that Baidu's executives' absence from the private enterprise symposium may have led to speculation that the company has lost its important position in the overall market. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkDvE38aAAMUzNH.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 17, Shandong Weilong Biscuit Company issued a notice that in order to help "Nezha 2" top the world box office rankings, it would suspend work and book a theater for employees to watch the movie.
Netizens said that a commercial movie must be sublimated to patriotism and national justice, which is a bit distorted.
Another netizen said: After leaving the theater, a brick hit the back, and the back that was just straight had to bend down again. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891780705363034113/pu/img/WXiepOHL3B9Qxfgz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 17, Shenzhen, Guangdong. Chinasoft International Shenzhen Branch cut salaries, hundreds of employees gathered downstairs of Tianan Cloud Valley office building to protest against the company's salary cuts and suppression of employees.
Screenshots of online chats said: "Today, salaries will be directly cut by 10% to 35%" "Chinasoft cuts salaries without negotiation, and some people's salaries are negative" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkD5jpYaAAAw2T6.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
How many "reassurance pills" have Chinese private enterprises taken since 2013?
In November 2018, President Xi Jinping emphasized at a symposium on private enterprises that "private enterprises and private entrepreneurs are our own people"
In December 2019, the CPC Central Committee and the State Council issued the "Opinions on Creating a Better Development Environment to Support the Reform and Development of Private Enterprises", further clarifying policies such as property rights protection, fair competition and financing support for private enterprises.
In September 2020, Xi Jinping proposed at a symposium of experts in the economic and social fields that it is necessary to build a "pro-clean" government-business relationship and promote the healthy development of the private economy.
The Central Economic Work Conference held in 2022 emphasized to the outside world China's firm position of adhering to the "two unshakable" principles, and once again clarified its support for private enterprises.
In July 2023, the CPC Central Committee and the State Council issued the "Opinions on Promoting the Development and Growth of the Private Economy", proposing 31 specific measures, emphasizing equal treatment...
fullContent:
自2013年以来，中国民营企业一共吃了多少颗“定心丸”？
2018年11月，习近平总在民营企业座谈会上强调”民营企业和民营企业家是我们自己人”
2019年12月，中共中央、国务院发布《关于营造更好发展环境支持民营企业改革发展的意见》，进一步明确民营企业产权保护、公平竞争和融资支持等政策。
2020年9月，习近平在经济社会领域专家座谈会上提出，要构建“亲清”政商关系，推动民营经济健康发展。
2022年召开的中央经济工作会议向外界强调了中国坚持“两个毫不动摇”的坚定立场，再次明确对民企的支持。
2023年7月，中共中央、国务院发布《关于促进民营经济发展壮大的意见》，提出31条具体措施，强调平等对待国有企业和民营企业。
2024年1月，中央经济工作会议强调优化民营经济发展环境，释放更大政策红利。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Former Hong Kong Legislative Council member Hui Chi-fung posted on social media that the Hong Kong court issued a property confiscation order under the National Security Law, confiscating all the property he, his wife and his mother had in Hong Kong. He criticized the confiscation order as a violation of human rights, aimed at cracking down on those who are still speaking out for democracy and freedom in Hong Kong, and politically retaliating against his continued work advocating for Hong Kong policies at the national level. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkEGDYSaAAEJBB4.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said at X: The emergency meeting of European leaders "reaffirmed" that Ukraine "deserves peace through strength, and that peace that respects Ukraine's independence, sovereignty and territorial integrity should be achieved." "Europe has fully assumed its share of military aid to Ukraine. At the same time, we need to strengthen Europe's defense." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkEKDUlaAAIMX2F.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 16, Luliang, Shanxi. It was revealed online that many sanitation workers in Lin County were owed wages and went to the government to seek justice. On February 18, a sanitation worker's family said, "My parents are both sanitation workers in the village. They are owed 600 yuan a month. They have been owed for 20 months. Only part of it was paid in 2023, and the rest has not been paid so far, spanning three years.
Sanitation company: The government's repayment is not good, and the company's funds are under pressure. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891805974941536256/pu/img/M1tL7__hhRw8650C.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reuters, Associated Press: Yesterday, Xi Jinping hosted a private enterprise forum in Beijing. Alibaba founder Jack Ma did attend the meeting, but Xinhua News Agency and other Chinese official media did not mention his name in the official reports. Foreign media pointed out that the initial report listed the names of some entrepreneurs who attended the meeting, but was subsequently deleted. The final public version only retained the names of some entrepreneurs, and Jack Ma was completely ignored. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkEPySpaAAExBO6.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Minsheng Watch reported on February 16 that human rights lawyer Lu Siwei was granted a lawyer's meeting in the detention center last Friday. Lu Siwei's wife Zhang Chunxiao revealed: Lu Siwei's psoriasis is still very serious and has not improved, because he uses domestic medicine, and the imported medicine he bought is not allowed to be sent in; the food is extremely poor, which leads to constipation, and diarrhea after taking medicine, alternating with each other; and because of long-term sitting on the board and lack of vitamins, he has hemorrhoids, blood in the stool, and a sore body... Minsheng Watch disclosed that lawyer Lu Siwei was arrested in Laos on July 28, 2023, and then repatriated to China; on October 10 last year, Lu Siwei was formally arrested by the Chenghua Branch of the Chengdu Public Security Bureau on the charge of "illegally crossing the border."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Chinese government is tightening restrictions on its citizens’ right to leave the country, Human Rights Watch said today. “The authorities are trying to extend the travel restrictions originally applied to Tibetans and Uighurs to all citizens in the name of fighting crime,” said Maya Wang, deputy China director at Human Rights Watch. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkEVj5waAAEcBGe.jpg

Some self-media also publish strange theories to attack private enterprises to gain traffic. If private entrepreneurs are not clear about these bad apples, they will not feel at ease. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkEbfD_aAAEdBEx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 17, Peking University economics professor Cao Heping said: Why is it logically wrong to say that Russia is an aggressor? The Russian-Ukrainian conflict is actually a war between "principals and agents". The principal is NATO and Ukraine is the agent. Russia sent troops to resist NATO's eastward expansion. It is legitimate defense and has nothing to do with aggression.
Netizens responded: "Fuck, Peking University professors also have this understanding" and "Peking University is catching up with Fudan University" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkEhJ84aAAIX7t4.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 18, the Supreme People's Procuratorate held a press conference: The Supreme People's Procuratorate attaches great importance to the supervision and governance of profit-seeking law enforcement and other issues involving enterprises. It will seize typical cases and resolutely correct profit-seeking law enforcement behaviors such as illegal case filing, meddling in economic disputes, cross-regional arrests, illegal seizures, detentions and freezing. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891835788511543298/pu/img/JY4NSZudgoyRicHI.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of February 18, Vietnam's National Assembly voted to pass the "Government Organization Law (Amendment)" to formally approve the largest government reform plan in decades. This move will cut thousands of jobs and radically streamline the bloated bureaucracy, and more than 100,000 civil servants are expected to lose their jobs. According to the plan, Vietnam will abolish five ministries, merge others, close several state-run television stations, and abolish several newspapers and magazines. These reforms are seen as key to achieving the 8% economic growth target promoted by Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh this year, and strive to achieve double-digit growth in the next few years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Shaanxi, a netizen named "Yiren" posted a video saying that a neighbor could not afford a house in the city, so he built a house in the countryside. Because he did not get approval from his superiors, the house was demolished by the urban management. The video showed that an old man picked up a shovel and tried to slap the urban management, but was stopped by everyone.
The original video has been deleted, but other netizens have forwarded the video, and many netizens have posted sarcastic comments in the comment area. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891845860092477440/pu/img/2vxUyheLTsIqYcTl.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's Xinhua News Agency will work with Japan's Kyodo News to improve views on bilateral relations.
China's state news agency Xinhua said it would deepen cooperation with Japan's Kyodo News to create a "good public opinion environment" for Sino-Japanese relations
Xinhua President Fu Hua said Beijing is willing to "further strengthen exchanges and cooperation between China's official news agency and Kyodo News," especially in the fields of new media and technology, Xinhua reported on Monday. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkFHKXMaAAAuW-v.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Village cadres called on the upper level to pay attention to the problem of low pensions for farmers, and then the video was deleted by the platform.
Recently, Wushan County, Chongqing. Li Shenghui, deputy secretary of the Quzhi Village Party Branch: Rural elderly pensions are only more than 100 yuan a month. Unit employees retire at the age of 60, but farmers only start at 60. Unit employees have too much pension to spend, but farmers' pensions are not enough to buy medicine. I hope the country will pay attention to the problem of farmers' pensions. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891872820696670209/pu/img/M6CdfaWviybApTWM.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The latest Taiwan political party identification of the Taiwan Public Opinion Foundation is released:
When the poll asked, "There are currently two major political parties in the country, the Democratic Progressive Party and the Kuomintang. Which party's ideas and propositions are closer to you?",
the results showed that 43.9% of the people thought that they were closer to the ideas and propositions of the Democratic Progressive Party, 30.9% of the people thought that they were closer to the ideas and propositions of the Kuomintang, 21.8% did not favor any party, and 3.4% did not know or refused to answer. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkFMdDNaAAABshx.jpg
